content: उत्तर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उद्-तरप्] {@--1@} Being or produced in the north, northern (declined like a pronoun). {@--2@} Upper, higher (<ab>opp.</ab> अधर); उत्तरेअधरे दंताः <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>; अवनतोत्तरकायं <ls>R. 9. 60</ls>; <ls>P. II. 2. 1.</ls> {@--3@} ({%a%}) Later-latter, following, subsequent (<ab>opp.</ab> पूर्व); पूर्वमेघः, उत्तरमेघः, °भीमांसा; उत्तरार्धः &c.; °रामचरितं later adventures of Rāma <ls>U. 1. 2</ls>; पूर्वः-उत्तरः former-latter <ls>H. 1. 9</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 136.</ls> ({%b%}) Future, concluding; °कालः subsequent time; °फलं; °वचनं a reply. {@--4@} Left (<ab>opp.</ab> दक्षिण). {@--5@} Superior, chief, excellent; dominant, powerful. {@--6@} Exceeding, transgressing, beyond; तर्कोत्तरां <ls>Mv. 2. 6.</ls> {@--7@} More, more than (generally as the last member of a <ab>comp.</ab> with numerals); षडुत्तरा विंशतिः <ls n="Mv. 2.">26</ls>; अष्टोत्तरं शतं <ls n="Mv. 2.">108.</ls> {@--8@} Accompanied or attended with, full of, consisting chiefly of, followed by (at the end of comp); राज्ञां तु चरितार्थता दुःखोत्तरैव <ls>Ś. 5</ls>; चषकोत्तरा <ls>R. 7. 49</ls>; अस्रोत्तरमीक्षितां <ls>Ku. 5. 61</ls>; उत्सवोत्तरो मंगलविधिः <ls>Dk. 39</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">166</ls>; <ls>K. 311</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 150</ls>; प्रवाल° पुष्पशय्ये <ls>R. 6. 50</ls> over spread with; धर्मोत्तरं <ls n="R.">13. 7</ls> rich in; <ls n="R.">18. 7</ls>; कंप° <ls n="R.">13. 28</ls>; <ls n="R.">17. 12</ls>; <ls n="R.">19. 23.</ls> {@--9@} To be crossed over. --रः {@--1@} Future time, futurity. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. --रा {@--1@} The north; अस्त्युत्तरस्यां दिशि देवतात्मा <ls>Ku. 1. 1.</ls> {@--2@} A lunar mansion. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the daughter of Virāṭa and wife of Abhimanyu. --रं {@--1@} An answer, reply; प्रचक्रमे च प्रतिवक्तुमुत्तरं <ls>R. 3. 47</ls>; उत्तरादुत्तरं वाक्यं वदतां संप्रजायते <ls>Pt. 1. 60</ls> a reply is suggested to a reply. {@--2@} (In law) Defence, a rejoinder. {@--3@} The last part or following member of a compound. {@--4@} (In <ls>Mīm.</ls>) The fourth member of an अधिकरण <ab>q. v.</ab>; the answer. {@--5@} The upper surface or cover. {@--6@} Conclusion. {@--7@} Remainder, rest, what followed or took place next; <ls>U. 3. 26.</ls> {@--8@} Superiority, excellence. {@--9@} Result, the chief or prevalent result or characteristic. {@--10@} Excess, over and above; see above (उत्तर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} 8). {@--11@} Remainder, difference (in arith.). --रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Above. {@--2@} Afterwards, after; तत उत्तरं, इत उत्तरं &c.
उत्तर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Crossing over. {@--2@} To be crossed over, as in दुरुत्तर.
